trends: There have been 55 other sightings in Anaheim
There were no other sightings in Anaheim on or around May 29th 2006
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsmy family and i were taking pictures of a parade at disneyland. i caught with my camera a group of luminous sphere like objects in formation . there were 16 of them. i saw spheres alone, but most were in groups of 2 spheres together. one of the groups had 4 spheres. i noticed that almost all of the groups seem to be diagonally oriented in relation to my position. i told by somebody that saw the picture that these could have been balloons. i disagree. i was taking many pictures, one after the other, and the picture i took seconds after this one has nothing in it. they were gone. balloons can't move that fast. balloons don't orient themselves diagonally. i remember that day very well. if you look at both pictures. there was no wind and it was a very hot day. i ran the picture through several image filter. in my software these things register as 3d objects. please let me know if you need any further information thanks {cms\jat\pid} text moved to narrative
Summary: 16 luminous sphere like UFOs in groups of 1, 2 and 4. Daylight event.
